name: zeit
description: a date and time library written in zig. Timezone, DST, and leap second aware

releases.name: v0.7.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Support for RFC1123 HTTP dates by @deevus in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/29
* gofmt: require fractional seconds to be all 0 or 9 by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/30
* Fix parsing of ISO 8601 basic format by @deevus in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/34
* Fix minute precision ISO8601 parsing with time zone by @raindev in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/35
* fix: remove usingnamespace in build.zig by @neurocyte in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/36
* adapt to zig 0.15.1 by @renerocksai in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/41

## New Contributors
* @deevus made their first contribution in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/29
* @raindev made their first contribution in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/35
* @neurocyte made their first contribution in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/36
* @renerocksai made their first contribution in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/41

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

releases.name: v0.5.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* tzdb: close file in local and localFromEnv by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/17
* zeit: prevent integer overflow when creating Instant from unix_timestamp by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/19
* Added Date comparison methods by @MSeiler-png in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/20

## New Contributors
* @MSeiler-png made their first contribution in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/20

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/compare/v0.4.4...v0.5.0

releases.name: v0.4.4
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* fix(posix): only adjust for dst if we are in dst by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/12
* fix(windows): use correct conditionals for dst end month by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/13
* Use type aliases to clarify integer usage by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/14


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

releases.name: v0.4.3
releases.body: - fix(strftime): %l shouldn't add one to hour

releases.name: v0.4.2
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* fix: integer overflow when adding or subtracting durations by @vascocosta in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/6
* fix(windows): use correct type for Windows.loadFromName by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/7
* fix(daysUntil): use larger integer type for proper underflow by @rockorager in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/9

releases.name: v0.4.1
releases.body: - Fix missing closing brace in strftime

releases.name: v0.4.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* zeit: add time comparison methods by @vascocosta in https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/pull/5
* add strftime and gofmt formatting
* fix bounds checking tzinfo transitions

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rockorager/zeit/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.body:
- Fix location references of sourcecode
- Fix argument for `Instant.in`
- Fix Readme links

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
- Add windows support
- Add support for TZ and TZDIR environment variables
- Add Olson names enum and map to Windows names
- Add support for parsing RFC5322 (email) formatted strings
